paper.title: The problem of deciding confluence on a given congruence class is tractable for finite special string-rewriting systems

author.org: Fachbereich Mathematik/Informatik, Gesamthochschule Kassel, Kassel, Federal Republic of Germany

paper.venue: Theory of Computing Systems / Mathematical Systems Theory
paper.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
paper.abstract: Given a finite special string-rewriting systemR on Σ and a wordw e Σ*, it is decidable in polynomial time whether or notR is confluent on the congruence class [w]R.
